name: PlowHand
description:
Created on the Weekly Game Jam 200 theme "Control the Environment".

Given your plot of land, try to make as much money as possible off of it by planting and harvesting a variety of crops.

 ~ Source Code ~

Made with Unity 2020. All art, assets, code, and music was created by WarmOverdrive with exception of those listed below:
Credits:

Toon Shader + Water Shader - RoyStan
Palette: "Nanner Jam" - Nannerman
Font: VCR OSD Mono - Riciery Leal
